DataElement.preferredName: Product Material Code Change Text ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A character string that is a revision of the original text of the product to enable the coding of the text. EXAMPLE(S): If the original text is "aspriin", the code modified text could be set to "aspirin", so that the text can be successfully coded. NOTE(S): In the context of BRIDG, text modification occurs a single time for a given instance of original text.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.
